title: Large Blue Diamond
description:
A large version of the small blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
apple_vendor_description: The large blue diamond emoji on Apple devices shines with a captivating sapphire-like brilliance, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its facets are meticulously crafted with smooth gradients, reflecting light in a way that emphasizes its preciousness and rarity. This emoji, with its cool, elegant azure tone, is often used to signify something valuable, luxurious, or exceptionally good.
